verses.text: Ha winhaj Benjamín ovanh yuninal winh: Aton sb'i eb' winh tik t'a stzolal: Vinhaj Bela, winh b'ab'el, winhaj Asbel, winhaj Ahara, winhaj Noha yet' winhaj Rafa.
Axo eb' winh yuninal winhaj Bela chi': Aton winhaj Adar, winhaj Gera, winhaj Abiud, winhaj Abisúa, winhaj Naamán, winhaj Ahoa, winhaj Gera, winhaj Sefufán yet' winhaj Hiram.

Ha eb' winh yuninal winhaj Aod: Aton winhaj Naamán, winhaj Ahías yet' winhaj Gera. Ha eb' winh tik yajal yaj eb' winh t'a skal eb' sk'ab'yoc cajan t'a Geba, palta ik'jinaquel eb' t'a Geba chi', ik'chajnacb'at cajan eb' t'a Manahat yuj winhaj Gera smam winhaj Uza yet' winhaj Ahiud.
Ha winhaj Saharaim ayto juntzanhxo eb' winh yuninal winh ix alji ayic ayek' winh t'a Moab, ayic toxo ix spuclaj sb'a winh yet' eb' ix yetb'eyum, aton ix Husim yet' ix Baara.
Axo eb' winh yuninal winh yet' junxo ix yetb'eyum scuchan Hodes: Aton winhaj Jobab, winhaj Sibia, winhaj Mesa, winhaj Malcam,
winhaj Jeúz, winhaj Saquías yet' winhaj Mirma. Ha juntzanh eb' winh tik yajal yaj eb' winh t'a skal eb' sk'ab'yoc.
Ay chavanh yuninal winh yet' ix yetb'eyum scuchan Husim chi', aton winhaj Abitob yet' winhaj Elpaal.
Axo eb' winh yuninal winhaj Elpaal chi': Aton winhaj Heber, winhaj Misam yet' winhaj Semed. Ha winhaj Semed chi' b'oannacq'ue chonhab' Ono, chonhab' Lod yet' yaldeail.
Ha winhaj Bería yet' winhaj Sema, yajal yaj eb' winh t'a skal eb' cajan t'a Ajalón, pechjinaquel eb' cajan t'a Gat yuj eb' winh.
Ha eb' yinhtilal winhaj Bería chi': Aton winhaj Ahío, winhaj Sasac yet' winhaj Jeremot, winhaj Zebadías, winhaj Arad, winhaj Ader, winhaj Micael, winhaj Ispa yet' winhaj Joha.
Axo eb' winh yuninal winhaj Elpaal: Aton winhaj Zebadías, winhaj Mesulam, winhaj Hizqui, winhaj Heber, winhaj Ismerai, winhaj Jezlías yet' winhaj Jobab.
Axo eb' winh yuninal winhaj Simei: Aton winhaj Jaquim, winhaj Zicri, winhaj Zabdi, winhaj Elienai, winhaj Ziletai, winhaj Eliel, winhaj Adaías, winhaj Beraías yet' winhaj Simrat.

Eb' winh yuninal winhaj Sasac: Aton winhaj Ispan, winhaj Heber, winhaj Eliel, winhaj Abdón, winhaj Zicri, winhaj Hanán, winhaj Hananías, winhaj Elam, winhaj Anatotías, winhaj Ifdaías yet' winhaj Peniel.
Eb' yuninal winhaj Jeroham: Aton winhaj Samserai, winhaj Seharías, winhaj Atalías, winhaj Jaresías, winhaj Elías yet' winhaj Zicri.
Ha juntzanh eb' winh ix b'inaj tik, yajal yaj eb' winh t'a junjun makan yinhtilal ix cajnaj t'a Jerusalén.
Ha t'a chonhab' Gabaón ek'nac winhaj Jehiel smam yicham eb' aj Gabaón chi'. Maaca sb'i ix yetb'eyum winh.

Ha eb' winh yuninal winh: Aton winhaj Abdón winh b'ab'el, winhaj Zur, winhaj Cis, winhaj Baal, winhaj Ner, winhaj Nadab, winhaj Gedor, winhaj Ahío, winhaj Zequer yet' winhaj Miclot, smam winhaj Simea. Anhejtona' juntzanh eb' winh tik ix cajnajpax eb' winh yet' eb' winh sk'ab'yoc t'a Jerusalén.
Ha winhaj Ner chi' smam winhaj Cis, haxo winhaj Cis smam winhaj Saúl. Axo eb' winh yuninal winhaj Saúl chi': Aton winhaj Jonatán, winhaj Malquisúa, winhaj Abinadab yet' winhaj Es-baal.
Ay jun yuninal winhaj Jonatán chi', aton winhaj Merib-baal, smam winhaj Micaía.
Axo eb' winh yuninal winhaj Micaía chi': Aton winhaj Pitón, winhaj Melec, winhaj Tarea yet' winhaj Acaz.
Axo winhaj Acaz chi' smam winhaj Joada, haxo winhaj Joada chi' smam winhaj Alemet, winhaj Azmavet yet' winhaj Zimri. Axo winhaj Zimri chi' smam winhaj Mosa.
Axo eb' winh yinhtilal winhaj Mosa chi' t'a stzolal: Vinhaj Bina, winhaj Rafa, winhaj Elasa, winhaj Azel.
Ha eb' winh yuninal winhaj Azel vacvanh eb' winh: Vinhaj Azricam, winhaj Bocru, winhaj Ismael, winhaj Searías, winhaj Obadías, winhaj Hanán.
Axo eb' winh yuninal winhaj Esec yuk'tac winhaj Azel: Aton winhaj Ulam winh b'ab'el unin, schab'il winhaj Jehús, yoxil winhaj Elifelet.

Ha eb' winh yuninal winhaj Ulam chi', te tek'an eb' winh yak'an oval, yojtac val eb' winh sjulvaji. Tzijtum yuninal eb' winh yet' yixchiquin, 150 sb'isul eb' winh t'a smasanil. Masanil juntzanh eb' winh chi', a winhaj Benjamín ay yinhtilal eb' winh.
